description: A large elephant wearing a hat sits at a bar alongside human patrons, using its trunk to pick up a small glass. The scene is surreal and darkly humorous, depicting the futility of trying to escape one's past through drinking. The irony lies in a creature famed for its memory attempting the very human act of drinking to forget. The sorrowful expression and heavy drinking of the elephant in this mundane bar setting highlight the absurdity and pathos of the situation.
caption: “It’s no use. I drink and I drink, and I still can’t forget.”
